name: Pyrls
headline: Modern medical reference app for healthcare providers
description:
Pyrls is a website and mobile app that enables healthcare providers to more effectively prescribe, dispense, and educate patients on their prescriptions.

Currently trusted by 50,000+ clinicians and trainees and hundreds of organizations, Pyrls is building the future of how clinicians learn and manage their clinical practice information.

founders.name: Derek Borkowski, Founder
founders.description: Derek Borkowski is a pharmacist and software engineer. He has past experience in community pharmacy, the pharmaceutical industry, and digital health. Derek holds a Doctor of Pharmacy (Pharm.D.) degree from the University of Minnesota.

# Drug information made easy
**50,000+ clinicians and trainees learn and manage drug information with Pyrls**
Sign Up
Features
Drug Summaries 
Pharmacotherapy 
AHFS Compendia 
Your Library 
Drug Interactions 
Assessments 
Flashcards 
![Drug Summaries](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/pyrls-prod.appspot.com/o/assets%2FmarketingWebsite%2Fdrug-summary.png?alt=media&token=55ee2aba-ee1e-40cf-a6f7-98adb043e142)
![Pharmacotherapy](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/pyrls-prod.appspot.com/o/assets%2FmarketingWebsite%2Fpharmacotherapy.png?alt=media&token=3922fbb0-d5e4-43ad-8e45-c5195d2c4241)
![American Hospital Formulary Service Drug Monographs](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/pyrls-prod.appspot.com/o/assets%2FmarketingWebsite%2Fahfs.png?alt=media&token=24c6b3f4-4a8e-470a-82ed-f50d8c0ce22c)
![Your Library](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/pyrls-prod.appspot.com/o/assets%2FmarketingWebsite%2Fyour-library.png?alt=media&token=7f317287-d869-494b-8ff8-be9396c3508c)
![Drug Interactions](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/pyrls-prod.appspot.com/o/assets%2FmarketingWebsite%2Fddi.png?alt=media&token=a92fffaa-b52b-4982-8f25-81dc9e552ffa)
![Your Library](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/pyrls-prod.appspot.com/o/assets%2FmarketingWebsite%2Fassessments.png?alt=media&token=c70051c3-2451-4b56-a2cb-05cf9b0cdb13)
![Flashcards](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/pyrls-prod.appspot.com/o/assets%2FmarketingWebsite%2Fflashcards.png?alt=media&token=b09089c2-ab97-4d4b-bc60-3a131e3c1790)
## **Key Features**
![](https://image.typedream.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=128,format=auto,fit=scale-down,quality=100/https://api.typedream.com/v0/document/public/e77da372-6664-45c6-a48b-48ce22f9c8be/2QsOfyXFSvcD05fvfw10w1b2MrT_pills.png)
**800+ Medication Summaries**
Concise, practical information on top medications, including key counseling and clinical review points, pharmacology, proper use, and more.
![](https://image.typedream.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=128,format=auto,fit=scale-down,quality=100/https://api.typedream.com/v0/document/public/e77da372-6664-45c6-a48b-48ce22f9c8be/2QsOsWQyxXxEiQHH4HLlUGEDsFO_docs.png)
**Pharmacotherapy Reviews**
Learn and review guidelines-driven pharmacotherapy management of major disease states with charts and detailed summaries.
![](https://image.typedream.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=128,format=auto,fit=scale-down,quality=100/https://api.typedream.com/v0/document/public/e77da372-6664-45c6-a48b-48ce22f9c8be/2QsPkjHUEqUt7JaYDUnAIOv74mE_knowl.png)
**Knowledge Check Assessments**
Test and refine your knowledge with weekly quizzes covering a variety of foundational and advanced pharmacotherapy topics.
![](https://image.typedream.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=128,format=auto,fit=scale-down,quality=100/https://api.typedream.com/v0/document/public/e77da372-6664-45c6-a48b-48ce22f9c8be/2QsQ5OYk6lTRzNQFv0CwobiTOi8_warn.png)
**Drug-Drug Interactions Tools**
Review and assess drug-drug interactions with our blazing-fast drug entry interface, and detailed interaction mechanism and explanation information.
![](https://image.typedream.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=128,format=auto,fit=scale-down,quality=100/https://api.typedream.com/v0/document/public/2FhuJm8rwjF3I7qpxi2k9pp4rCb_Frame_184-2.png?bucket=document)
**Fully-Automated Keyword Grouping**
Taking an average of two metrics is not correct. We calculate the weighted average of each metric for better insights.
![](https://image.typedream.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=128,format=auto,fit=scale-down,quality=100/https://api.typedream.com/v0/document/public/2FhuKqksXbw47K3KeyCqAoibhW4_Frame_184-3.png?bucket=document)
**Backed By 15 Billion Keywords**
Continuous crawl is the most important part of our data culture. We are collecting more and more data every day.
## **The Pyrls Difference: Focus on Pharmacotherapy**
![](https://image.typedream.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=128,format=auto,fit=scale-down,quality=100/https://api.typedream.com/v0/document/public/e77da372-6664-45c6-a48b-48ce22f9c8be/2QsRpM8kEmq01bevMqpKzo9rk3v_ahi.png)
###  Guideline-Driven Information
Authoritative clinical guideline recommendations are at the top of our editorial hierarchy. The Pyrls difference comes from pairing descriptive and guideline-based medication information.
![](https://image.typedream.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=128,format=auto,fit=scale-down,quality=100/https://api.typedream.com/v0/document/public/e77da372-6664-45c6-a48b-48ce22f9c8be/2QsRtz7Xqf93ktgzlEL0aRjh5nV_aclin.png)
### Clinician-Curated Insights
Our editorial team and advisory board of practicing clinicians ensure that information is up to date, relevant, and applicable to how medications should be used in modern clinical practice.
![](https://image.typedream.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=750,format=auto,fit=scale-down,quality=100/https://api.typedream.com/v0/document/public/2d2d34a1-5141-4a09-abe0-5d89fae0e074_0171a00c-2c0f-492b-80aa-595b745199fc_png.png)
### Get a complete bank account
Open bank accounts with virtual cards, team management, API access, and more.
[Learn more ->](https://pyrls.com/<https:/typedream.com/>)﻿
![](https://image.typedream.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=750,format=auto,fit=scale-down,quality=100/https://api.typedream.com/v0/document/public/3252c1fd-c5f1-4b9b-91d7-75ccb4670ee6_5754ee30-99ef-407f-b834-39a988d5ae94_png.png)
### Auto-Generate Reports
Easily generate monthly, quarterly, and yearly reports with just one click.
[Learn more ->](https://pyrls.com/<https:/typedream.com/>)﻿
![](https://image.typedream.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=640,format=auto,fit=scale-down,quality=100/https://api.typedream.com/v0/document/public/5bea6ef6-750f-4ff0-a242-5276d2edebe5_LandingPageMockup_png.png)
### Manage from your phone
Manage your account with confidence using our powerful mobile app.
[Learn more ->](https://pyrls.com/<https:/typedream.com/>)﻿
# A technology-firstapproach to financial management
Built with security and **easy-of-use** in mind.
**Check the documentation**
**Fast & secure platform**
We release hundreds of features to help you manage your finances securely with speed.
**Built-in Reports**
Generate useful insights & quick summaries in seconds with our state-of-the-art AI software.
**Transparent**
We believe in transparency when it comes in your companies finances and team management.
**Reliable**
Our systems operate with 99.9%+ uptime and is certified with the highest standards.
# Why people love us
I have to say that this software is an amazing time saver. My team and I can run our business with ease.
**Jane Cooper**
CEO StarCross
for the first time we have an easy to use, comprehensive, and affordable software to manage our company's finances. I recommend Banker to any business looking to streamline their processes.
**Guy Hawkins**
COO Calipse
The product is very intuitive, easy to use and connect to accounting and other financial systems. The support is also very good and I have always received answers promptly.
**Jacob Jones**
CEO Platinex
I like the integration with Quickbooks, Banker is intuitive and easy to use. The customer service is awesome and friendly.
**Leslie Alexander**
Product Manager Alamander
Banker is an amazing application for running your business. I can make better financial decisions with data I can trust.
**Jenny Wilson**
Founder Propy
Banker helps us monitor and manage our company's finances. It is so easy to set up, I'm still not sure how to use it properly. I'm a total beginner and I can use Banker without any problems.
**Cameron Williamson**
Co-Founder Criplet
# Start growing with Cardy
Explore Cardy with our sales team and schedule a demo today. **Open an account in 15 minutes** , right from your phone.
**Open an account**

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Pyrls**

Pyrls is redefining the future of medical reference tools tailored for healthcare providers. Launched in 2020, this startup has rapidly positioned itself as a vital resource for clinicians, boasting over 50,000 users‚Äîincluding healthcare practitioners and trainees‚Äîas well as numerous organizations. The company's mission is straightforward yet powerful: to enhance the way healthcare professionals prescribe, dispense, and educate patients about medications.

**Origins and Foundation**

What started as a simple website has blossomed into a full-fledged mobile application, making vital drug information accessible at the fingertips of those in the healthcare sector. Pyrls participated in Y Combinator Batch W22, which highlights its potential and innovative approach in the healthcare SaaS landscape.

**Location and Team**

Based in Minneapolis, MN, Pyrls operates with a lean team of three. This compact setup suggests agility and strong team dynamics, necessary elements for a company operating in the fast-paced healthcare industry.

**Key Features**

Pyrls is not just another medical app; it‚Äôs loaded with features that resonate with the needs of its users:

- **800+ Medication Summaries**: Delivering succinct and essential information on a myriad of medications, helping clinicians make informed decisions.
- **Pharmacotherapy Reviews**: Detailed guidelines-driven pharmacotherapy management information for major disease states.
- **Drug-Drug Interactions Tools**: A user-friendly interface to check interactions and understand their mechanisms.
- **Knowledge Assessments**: Weekly quizzes to test the understanding of vital pharmacotherapy principles.
